price: 101. Usun Woo dambih jahannam girai waarak, kaadu woo qilsi dambih Quukiyyi manxu uma quukaay keenih yakkem Qhiyaamah ayro.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهِۖ وَسَآءَ لَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ حِمۡلٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhi wasāa lahum yawma al-qiyāmati ḥim'lan
